Introduction

Choi Beomgyu is a South Korean singer-songwriter, dancer, and composer under BIGHIT MUSIC and HYBE Labels. He is best known as one of the visuals of the boy group TXT.

Beomgyu is known for his unique charms and high energy. He is a mood-maker, as told by everyone around him. After training for three years, Beomgyu made his official debut on March 4, 2019, as a member of Big Hit's five-member boy group TXT (Tomorrow X Together).

On January 21, 2019, Beomgyu was revealed as the fifth and last member of TXT. The group officially debuted on March 4, 2019, with their debut mini album "The Dream Chapter: STAR". He later made his solo debut on March 27, 2025 with Beomgyu's Mixtape:Panic.

Fun facts

1
In an interview, Beomgyu stated that V is his role model. V used to give him lots of advice back when he was still a trainee.
…
2
According to Beomgyu, he is the mood maker of the group.
…
3
Beomgyu has his own studio where he writes songs for the group.
…
4
According to Beomgyu, he is always the first to fall asleep in the group.
…
5
Beomgyu used to be in a rock band. He can play the Electric Guitar.
…
6
Beomgyu has been composing songs for a long time. He also took part in producing their song "Maze in the Mirror".
…
7
According to Beomgyu, he learned how to play the guitar from watching YouTube videos.
…
8
Beomgyu loves knitted clothes.
…
9
Beomgyu has a Satoori Accent since he is from Daegu.
…
10
All TXT members have type A Blood, except for Beomgyu with blood type AB.
